title: How do I deal with taric's mana usage?
body: Clearly it's intended, but holy shit. I built iceborn and I still went through mana like it was nothing.

replies.body: what about add the new last chapter in {{item:3050}} and increase the mana amount, this could be a good item to the new Taric
I don't have mana issues with Taric. I also generally don't spam spells though
He is one mana hungry primadonna
you almost need chalice with a mana item.

He's not a healbot anymore, so only heal during actual fights.  You don't really get to constantly top off your ADC after trades like you used to.

Shield is even worse when it comes to mana.  Only use it if you're switching targets, or if it's absolutely necessary.

This is, of course, considering the lane phase only.  I haven't played him since he came over from the PBE, but I like taking Teleport on him instead of Exhaust.  Let's you go buy and regain mana while your ADC is getting solo XP while minimizing the risk.
